alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Broome, southern Cortland, northeastern Tioga, east central Tompkins and west central Chenango Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Caroline, or 11 miles west of Marathon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Caroline, Nanticoke, Berkshire, Richford, Whitney Point, Harford, Marathon, Lapeer, Lisle and Chenango Forks. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 7 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
